name: retina
description: Upload XUnit test results to Intland Retina
author: Intland Software

inputs.name: test_xml_folder
inputs.label: Test XML folder path
inputs.helpMarkDown: UNIX-style path relative to the project's root. If not specified, uploads all test xml files in project. Search for xml files is recursive.

inputs.name: test_run_name
inputs.label: Test run name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Identifies the test run in Retina

inputs.name: test_run_id
inputs.label: Test run ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique ID for the test runs, default value assigns the Azure Build number.

inputs.name: server_url
inputs.label: Retina server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Can be https://company.codebeamer.net/retina or https://company.com/retina, where Retina is running. Normally it should end with /retina.

inputs.name: retina_user
inputs.label: Retina automation user
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please use a secret value by adding $(secretname), where the secret specifies the user

inputs.name: retina_password
inputs.label: Retina automation password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please use a secret value by adding $(secretname), where the secret specifies the password

inputs.name: test_configuration_id
inputs.label: Test configuration ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test configration ID number from the name TestConf-<ID>

inputs.name: test_case_tracker_id
inputs.label: Test case tracker ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test case tracker ID can be obtained by opening the desired tracker and the ID is shown in the URL.

inputs.name: test_run_tracker_id
inputs.label: Test run tracker ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test run tracker ID number. Navigate to the desired test run tracker and obtain the ID from the URL.
